str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To raise, lift up, take away, remove.
A stone; met: of Jesus as the chief stone in a building. Apparently a primary word; a stone.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To hide, conceal, lay up. A primary verb; to conceal.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of hieros; a sacred place, i.e. The entire precincts of the Temple.
